metadata.title: CVE-2024-25442 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the HuginBase::PanoramaMemento::loadPTScript function of Huginv2022.0.0 allows attackers to cause a heap buffer overflow via parsing acrafted image.

criterions.comment: hugin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
